page.title: 08Trade in S.E. Guildford
page.content:
Most of the shops at the top of the High Street cover the essential needs of the local people. There is a chemist, launderette, video shop, florist and fish and chip shop. There is also a delicatessen which sells unusual cheeses and breads, eggs and milk, all at relatively high prices. They sell home-made sandwiches and have a large variety of wines. There are Thai, Chinese and Italian restaurants. The area has a large number of estate agents.
In the White Lane area there are no shops, but there is a poultry farm. In Shalford there is a sweet shop and in Chilworth there is a newsagent, butcher, garage and a public house called the Percy Arms. Bitter is the most popular drink and lunches are also very popular.
